resources.string: We are determined to introduce newbies and oldies interested in Android development to the framework. We hope to build a budding community of world class android developers who can take on real world projects One step at a time, we seek to mentor, train and guide budding android developers on their journey, and have fun while at it

I am a newbie to Android development. I am very enthusiastic about creating tech-based solutions for my community. I am determined, self motivated, curious, and have great thirst for knowledge. I am brave, I am bruised, I am who am meant to be, THIS IS ME. ~The Greatest Showman.
